description: For a treatment plan created from a linked protocol (PTP) record, this table stores the instance number (or repetition number) for the billing protocol treatment days linked to this clinical day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: BILLING_DAY_SRC_INSTANCE_NUM
columns.description: For each linked billing protocol treatment day in the TPL_TX_SOURCE_BILLING_CSN table, this column stores the corresponding instance number (or repetition number) represented by this clinical day in the treatment plan.
